description: Painter is an application that provides various features for creating realistic digital paintings. One of its features is brush strokes with styles, including gradients, you can apply to alter their appearance. Gradients are similar to other Painter media such as Weaves, Looks, and Patterns.

detailed_instructions: You can open a GRADIENTS file with Corel Painter (even though Corel replaced the format). For example, to open a GRADIENTS file, select Window → Media Panels → Gradients , click the "Manage Libraries" button, then select Import Legacy Gradient Library .
